pages.text: Tritium is another isotope of $(l:gas/hydrogen)Hydrogen$(/l), with two extra neturons.  It is used as fuel in the $(l:multiblocks/fusion_reactor)Fusion Reactor$(/l).

It can either be injected directly into the reactor along with $(l:chemicals/deuterium)Deuterium$(/l), or combined into $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l).  The latter is only useful if production is very high, see $(l:multiblocks/fusion_reactor)Fusion Reactor$(/l) for more information.
